Class DepositProductAmountDetails

  • java.lang.Object

  • @Embeddable
public class DepositProductAmountDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    RecurringDepositProductAmountDetails encapsulates all recurring Deposit Amount of a RecurringDepositProduct.
